snippet: A gunman armed with a shotgun opened fire on the campus of Seattle Pacific University, leaving three people wounded and one dead before being taking into custody, the Seattle police said.
abstract: Seattle police say gunman armed with a shotgun opened fire on the campus of Seattle Pacific University, leaving three people wounded and one dead before being taking into custody.

byline.contributor: Ashley Southall contributed reporting from New York, and Stacey Solie from Seattle.

lead_paragraph: A gunman armed with a shotgun opened fire on the campus of Seattle Pacific University, leaving three people wounded and one dead before being taking into custody, the Seattle police said.

headline.main: Shooting Leaves One Dead at Seattle Pacific University
headline.print_headline: Gunman Stages Deadly Attack at University Campus in Seattle
